name: Avoid Functions and Procedures having bad naming convention (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all the normalized PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures having a bad naming convention.
output:
The report lists all the  normalized PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures having bad naming convention.

It provides following information: 
-  PL1 Function and PL1 Procedure full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected. Furthermore, the normalized procedure play an important role in architectural patterns and are therefore important to maintain.
remediation: Rename the normalized procedures having a bad naming convention.
total: Number of PL1 Functions and PL1 Procedures
